channel.title: Java - Pokémon - Text Based
channel.description:
What's up guys , just got bored and decided to start a new little project... This time i'm gonna remake the old pokémon game ( like red and blue ) in a text based game ( running in a command prompt as i cba to make a GUI for such a game ).
[b]PROJECT HAS BEEN DELAYED FOR A MONTH ; EXAMS ARE MORE IMPORTANT :p[/b]
I'll try to make it realistic and add combat , enemy trainers , wild pokémon ( which you can catch ) , gyms and badges etc... So yeah , here's the update log:
[code] * added a login setup requiring only a username * added playersaving * added playerloading * added the cities from and to which the player can travel * started on writing how the player will move through the cities (you can only move to adjacent cities on the old map ; the island city will require a pokemon that can swim , when you have a pokemon that can fly you will be able to fly to all the cities , etc...) [/code]
here's an example of how it looks so far (gameplay) : [code] Welcome to Pokemon!
Do you have an existing account? (enter 1 for yes , 2 for no) 1: Yes - login 2: No - Create a new account
2 Please provide a name for your account : lol This name is already being used , please pick another one!
Do you have an existing account? (enter 1 for yes , 2 for no) 1: Yes - login 2: No - Create a new account
1 What's the name of your account? lol
__________________________________________
You are now at : Pallet Town
[/code]
I'll develop this game as far as i can as it is mainly for learning purposes :p

swing is disgusting

That’s kind of the main reason i don’t like working with it xD
But i figured i should learn it for later ; i really want to learn how code with images and etc…

Back to the project ;
I’ve started working on how the players moves in the game:
Depending on what city you’re in , there are a number of buildings you can go to ; these include the gym , the pokecenter and the shop.
Along with these , you can move to any adjacent city.

I won’t code beyond that for a month as my exams are about to start in a week and the month after that i’ll be in Turkey
I’ll release the whole source once what i’ve listed here has been implemented , which should be due to the end of this weekend.

item.title: Java - Pokémon - Text Based
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

there isn’t much content right now ; after having finished with writing travelling between cities i will have to add things you can do in a city ( gym , poke center , shop )…

Here’s an idea of how the game will be like ;
the storyline will be approx the same as of the real games ; start in pallet town , make your way to the next city , fight the gym masters ( and the other trainers there ) ,get the badge for that gym/city and move on to the next one.
Once you have all the badges , you can move to the indigo plateau and fight those chamions or w/e they’re called.
I don’t know how i will code each and every Pokemon , i think i’ll write a database , if not i’ll just code all the data for the pokemons into arrays =D

And i bassically suck at using the Swing Component for java ; so i don’t think i’ll be making a GUI for the game any time soon ( probably never ) .
I’ll make another project later on to practice Swing.

As for pokemons themselves occuring in-game ; when traveling to another city you wil have 1/5 chance to find a trainer , 2/5 chance to find a wild pokemon and 2/5 of succesfully moving to your destination without any problems.
